list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: tending or designed to stick to things on contact or covered with something that sticks.
(of the weather) hot and damp; muggy.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: it was an unusually hot and sticky summer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đó là một mùa hè nóng bỏng bất thường và dính

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the relationship is going through a sticky patch
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mối quan hệ đang trải qua một miếng dán dính

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a website or its content) attracting a long visit or repeat visits from users.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: make your site as sticky as possible to keep visitors there longer
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Làm cho trang web của bạn như dính nhất có thể để giữ khách truy cập lâu hơn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in an online forum) a thread containing important information that is set to remain at the top of the other threads regardless of when it was last updated.
